slides.title: Lines and Angles
slides.content:
**Types of Angles:**
- Acute: < 90°
- Right: 90°
- Obtuse: 90° < angle < 180°
- Straight: 180°
- Reflex: > 180°

**Complementary angles:** Sum = 90°
**Supplementary angles:** Sum = 180°

slides.title: Triangles
slides.content:
**Types by sides:**
- Equilateral: All sides equal
- Isosceles: Two sides equal
- Scalene: No sides equal

**Types by angles:**
- Acute: All angles < 90°
- Right: One angle = 90°
- Obtuse: One angle > 90°

**Sum of angles = 180°**

slides.title: Triangle Properties
slides.content:
**Pythagoras Theorem:**
In right triangle: a² + b² = c²

**Area of triangle:**
Area = (1/2) × base × height
Area = √[s(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)] (Heron's formula)
where s = (a+b+c)/2

slides.title: Quadrilaterals
slides.content:
**Square:**
- All sides equal
- All angles 90°
- Diagonals equal and bisect at 90°

**Rectangle:**
- Opposite sides equal
- All angles 90°

**Parallelogram:**
- Opposite sides parallel and equal
- Opposite angles equal

slides.title: Circles
slides.content:
**Radius (r):** Distance from center to circumference

**Diameter (d):** d = 2r

**Circumference:** 2πr or πd

**Area:** πr²

**Chord:** Line joining two points on circle
**Tangent:** Line touching circle at one point
